src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_rho_f.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Copy outward values of the density (rho_f) from the three outermost real node layers onto the three ghost layers for the order parameter grid.

MPI exchange is done using non-blocking receive and blocking send pairs (completed by a wait statement) in alternate directions to avoid deadlock. Rho_f is packed into arrays for each of the directions before the MPI exchange.
